pages.text: Once imbued into cobblestone that is adjacent to water, it will appear like any other mossy stone. Carefully scraping with a knife will give you Terra Moss, and indeed, this process can be performed even on mossy stones not imbued by you.

pages.name: Terra Moss
pages.text: Scraping a number of other mossy blocks with a knife will also give you terra moss.$(br2)$(info) These other blocks can also be imbued as can cobblestone.
